stem: The clinical features of severe preeclampsia include all of the following except
disc:
Features of severe preeclampsia include:
- Persistent severe headache
- Visual abnormalities
- Upper abdominal pain
- Altered mental status
- Dyspnea, retrosternal chest pain
- Generalized hyperreflexia
- Oliguria (<500ml/24h in severe disease)
- Placental abruption
